text: Sakari Paasonen (12 October 1935 - 6 November 2020) was a Finnish sport shooter. He competed in pistol shooting events at the Summer Olympics in 1988 and 1992. Paasonen was born in MÃ¤ntyharju, Finland. Paasonen died on 6 November 2020 in Helsinki, aged 85. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Olympians for Finland Category:Sport shooters
title: Sakari Paasonen
